title: Renovated 3 Bed, 2 Bath light filled apt with in unit Washer/ Dryer
map_address: 468 East 54th Street near Between Beverly Road and Tilden Avenue
posting_body: ['Light filled, RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment close to Kings Highway.', 'Located on a residential street and maintained by the same family since they purchased it in 1972.', 'This apartment has undergone an extensive renovation and is offered with brand new appliances and finishes throughout.', 'Generous closet space and spacious living area.', 'Be the first to move in after the renovation!', 'Located within a 20 minute or shorter drive to Brookdale Hospital, Kings County Hospital, Kingsbrook Medical Center and Downstate Medical Center.', 'Also within a 25 minute drive of Brooklyn Methodist, Maimonides Medical Center Program, Wyckoff Heights Medical Center, Interfaith, NYC Health and Hospitals/Coney Island Hospital Program and the Brooklyn Hospital Center.', '• Washer / Dryer in unit', '• Dishwasher', '• Vented Microwave', '• Ductless A/C unit', '• LED Smart Lighting', '• Ethernet ports', '• High ceilings', '• Onsite parking available', '(ask for details)', 'B46 Bus to Utica Ave 3 and 4 Trains', 'RENTAL REQUIREMENTS', 'Monthly Rent: $3,600', 'Lease: One year', 'Application Fee: $20', 'Guarantors are accepted', 'Tenant pays cooking gas and electricity', 'Security deposit: $3,600', 'Utilities: Tenant pays electric and cooking gas, Landlord pays heat and hot water', 'Pets: cats only', 'PLEASE: NO BROKERS, NO EXCEPTIONS']
